Educational Content Only

Services & Education

Evidence-based lifestyle medicine education and resources for men over 35. No personalized medical advice is provided through this website.

Important Notice

This website provides educational content only. I am not providing personalized medical advice online, and this content is not a substitute for your own clinician.

For clinical care, please consult your usual GP or appropriate healthcare services. This site does not deliver clinical care or personalized medical advice.

What I Cover

Weight Management Education

  • • Evidence-based approaches to sustainable weight management
  • • Understanding metabolism and energy balance
  • • Practical strategies for busy schedules
  • • Avoiding common pitfalls and fad diets

Sleep Optimization

  • • Sleep quality vs. quantity strategies
  • • Circadian rhythm optimization
  • • Sleep environment improvements
  • • Managing sleep disruptions

Movement & Exercise

  • • Zone 2 training and aerobic base building
  • • Strength training for men over 35
  • • Recovery and injury prevention
  • • Exercise prescription for busy schedules

Nutrition Fundamentals

  • • Protein needs and timing for men over 40
  • • Metabolic flexibility and fuel sources
  • • Practical meal planning strategies
  • • Supplementation when appropriate

Stress Management

  • • Understanding stress and its health impacts
  • • Practical stress reduction techniques
  • • Work-life balance strategies
  • • Building resilience and recovery

Behavior Change

  • • Building sustainable health habits
  • • Overcoming common barriers
  • • Goal setting and tracking
  • • Maintaining motivation long-term

What I Don't Provide

  • • Personalized medical advice online - All content is educational only
  • • Diagnosis or treatment recommendations - This requires proper clinical assessment
  • • Substitute for your own clinician - Always consult your GP for medical concerns
  • • Emergency medical advice - For emergencies, dial 111 in New Zealand
  • • Prescription medications - This requires proper medical consultation

How to Access This Content

Weekly Newsletter

Practical strategies and research breakdowns delivered to your inbox every week.

Monthly AMA

Ask questions and get educational responses in monthly Q&A sessions.

Speaking & Workshops

Educational presentations and workshops on lifestyle medicine topics.

Get Started with Weekly Insights

Join my newsletter for practical, evidence-based strategies that you can implement immediately. No medical advice, just education and actionable tactics.
